summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to defense counsel in the case of United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, transmitting a batch of discovery materials (control numbers SDNY_GM_02743103 through SDNY_GM_02743292) and noting the materials are governed by a protective order.

events.title: Discovery Production to Maxwell Defense
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office produces a batch of discovery materials (SDNY_GM_02743103 through SDNY_GM_02743292) to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense counsel.

events.title: Protective Order Issued
events.description: A protective order was issued in the case of United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, governing the handling of confidential discovery materials.

keyFacts: The document is a formal discovery production letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.
The production includes materials stamped with control numbers SDNY_GM_02743103 through SDNY_GM_02743292.
All produced materials are governed by a protective order dated July 31, 2020.
The letter itself is designated as 'confidential' because it references records designated as confidential under the protective order.
The government acknowledges its ongoing discovery obligations and commits to promptly producing additional discoverable material.
